Package com.brad.rain.graphics

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brad.rain.graphics.Screen
  • public class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
    Screen is responsible for handling how each type of object is rendered in the game. Its methods fill the pixels array with RGB colours. This data is then handed back to the Game class to be rendered by rasterized buffered image \s.
